name: Clinging To The Edge
Lore: 'There are some times, more than others, when you should not look down.',
Text: 'If opponent''s Dark Jedi with at least one combat card just initiated lightsaber combat against your Jedi with none, draw 3 destiny and choose 2 to use for lightsaber combat destiny. You may take other card into hand, or return it to top of Reserve Deck.',
